name: void (itch) (GummyBot)
description:
Be careful, it's totally clunky and unfair, and the final boss is ORYX THE MAD GOD!

In the first level there is a secret switch (not so secret if you're looking for it) that changes the boss to a harder version. The boss also now drops the fire weapon.

There's a locked door in the starting hub. Once through the door there is a wall only destroyed by fire, past that is the final level with Oryx, so make sure to not replace the fire weapon.

Rogue is probably the best class tbh

Controls

WASD - Move

LMB - Shoot

Spacebar - Use class ability. (if mana is at max)

E - Open bags

F - Drink health potion

C - Switch weapon slot. Use this to switch to an empty slot when opening boss drops incase its a weapon, this way it won't overwrite your current weapon. (I made this game years ago, i didn't think of just putting it in the empty slot)

Y - RESET GAME (be careful of this button, unless you're dead, then use it.)

PS: I know all my games are called "Void" It's just a personal problem...
